Text: I think this is the same file as the Torrent named "Movie - Scrat - Collected Works - (2002 - 2006) - [Thalruistic]".  This file has complete sources whereas the other one this not.  Download this file not the other Torrent.
Brilliant stuff.  My 3 year old son thanks you and I thank you that I no longer have to skip through the DVDs to find the bits with "the squirrel" in.

I seem to be the ONLY seeder...

I will seed for as long as I can.

Please assist in the seeding when you get your copy!

Thanks.

-Moon
